head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Albany: New Head Of Long Island Power Authority

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Albany: New Head Of Long Island Power Authority

body.head.byline: By BRUCE LAMBERT; Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: New York Gov Eliot Spitzer appoints Kevin S Law as new chairman of Long Island Power Authority; photo (S)

block.p: Gov. Eliot Spitzer appointed the Suffolk County executive's chief deputy, Kevin S. Law, left, the new chairman of the Long Island Power Authority yesterday. Mr. Law succeeds Richard M. Kessel, who headed the agency under Govs. Mario M. Cuomo and George E. Pataki. Mr. Kessel is expected to take on the vacant post of chief executive officer for several months and then retire. Mr. Law is then expected to succeed him as the chief executive officer, at which point a new chairman will be appointed.
